https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4zWcNb88EdKyIFkVuqKGoUHv6mL.jpg Rasoul who works as a teller in a bank, lives a simple life with his wife, Zohre, and their daughter. Until one day, he has a road accident with a wealthy woman named Batoul and her son. Rasoul takes them to the hospital and they soon realize that Batoul has gotten amnesia ... Color of the Night
